actionConfiguration.body:
WITH
	target_spend AS
	(
		SELECT
			target_spend_input * (distribution_pct / 100) as expected_target_spend_distribution,
			target_spend_distribution
		FROM
			REFERENCE_DEV.PICNMIX_GOALS.PICNMIX_GOALS_DETAIL
		WHERE
			fk_goal_id = {{ SelectGoal.selectedOptionValue }}
			
			
	)
	SELECT
		SUM(expected_target_spend_distribution) AS expected_target,
		SUM(target_spend_distribution) AS target_spend,
		SUM(expected_target_spend_distribution) - SUM(target_spend_distribution) as remaining_spend
	FROM
		target_spend
